description.en: Members of your party (including you) will no longer be ejected automatically when they are offline. The scroll will be consumed and only applies on your current party.
description.ar: Members of your party (including you) will no longer be ejected automatically when they are offline. The scroll will be consumed and only applies on your current party.
description.br: Os membros do seu grupo (incluindo você) não serão mais removidos automaticamente quando não estiverem online. O pergaminho será consumido e funcionará apenas no seu grupo atual.
description.cns: 你的剧团成员(包括你自己)在离线时将不会自动退出剧团。使用后卷轴会被消耗，并且只对你当前的队伍有效。
description.de: Mitglieder werden nicht länger automatisch aus der aktuellen Party entfernt, wenn sie offline sind. Die Schriftrolle kann nur einmal benutzt werden und wirkt sich nur auf deine aktuelle Party aus.
description.fi: Members of your party (including you) will no longer be ejected automatically when they are offline. The scroll will be consumed and only applies on your current party.
description.fil: Members of your party (including you) will no longer be ejected automatically when they are offline. The scroll will be consumed and only applies on your current party.
description.fr: Vous et les membres de votre groupe ne serez plus éjectés automatiquement si vous êtes déconnectés. Ce parchemin sera consommé et ne s'applique qu'à votre groupe actuel.
description.id: Anggota party Anda (termasuk Anda) tidak akan lagi dikeluarkan secara otomatis saat mereka offline. Scroll akan dikonsumsi dan hanya berlaku pada party Anda saat ini.
description.it: Members of your party (including you) will no longer be ejected automatically when they are offline. The scroll will be consumed and only applies on your current party.
description.jp: パーティーメンバー（自分を含む）がオフラインのときでも、パーティを脱退せずに維持されます。現在のパーティにのみ適用されます。
description.kr: 극단의 구성원이 오프라인일 때 자동적으로 방출되지 않습니다. 두루마리는 소비되며, 현재 극단에만 적용됩니다.
description.nl: Members of your party (including you) will no longer be ejected automatically when they are offline. The scroll will be consumed and only applies on your current party.
description.pl: Members of your party (including you) will no longer be ejected automatically when they are offline. The scroll will be consumed and only applies on your current party.
description.ru: Members of your party (including you) will no longer be ejected automatically when they are offline. The scroll will be consumed and only applies on your current party.
description.sp: Los miembros de tu Party (incluido tú) no serán expulsados automáticamente cuando se desconecten. El pergamino se gastará y solo hará efecto en la Party actual.
description.sw: Members of your party (including you) will no longer be ejected automatically when they are offline. The scroll will be consumed and only applies on your current party.
description.th: สมาชิกในปาร์ตี้ของคุณ (รวมถึงคุณ) จะไม่ถูกไล่ออกโดยอัตโนมัติอีกต่อไปเมื่อออฟไลน์ ไอเทมจะถูกใช้หมดและมีผลกับปาร์ตี้ปัจจุบันของคุณเท่านั้น
description.tw: 你的劇團成員(包含你)將不會在登出時被自動踢出劇團，使用卷軸只會在你當前的劇團擁有效果
description.vi: Các thành viên trong nhóm của bạn (bao gồm cả bạn) sẽ không còn tự động bị loại ra khi họ ngoại tuyến. Cuộn sẽ được sử dụng và chỉ áp dụng cho bên hiện tại của bạn.
